sentences.english: After "The Second Opium War", the Westernization movement has developed.

sentences.english: Westernization Movement is the process in which some Chinese with advanced knowledge explore how to modernize China.
sentences.chinese: 洋务运动是部分先进的中国人探索中国近代化的过程。
